rows.label: tlk70000067_06_msg0002
rows.name:
If you're to cross the Dannagh Desert,
would you come and stay at my inn
first?

rows.label: tlk70000067_06_msg0003
rows.name:
I don't have much to share with you,
but will you let me do what I can?

rows.label: tlk70000067_06_msg0004
rows.name:
There's a reason I've been running this
inn for the past 70-odd years, you
know. I like helping folks.

rows.label: tlk70000067_06_msg0201
rows.name:
You want to look round the village
more? Of course I understand.

rows.label: tlk70000067_06_msg0202
rows.name:
I'll be waiting. Take all the time
you need to explore.
